ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Stuck threads
ygData.msgSnippet: I made an issue for the stuck threads Tom: https://sourceforge.net/tracker/index.php?func=detail&aid=1067095&group_id=73833&atid=539102. It has a patch in it

I made an issue for the stuck threads Tom: 
https://sourceforge.net/tracker/index.php?func=detail&aid=1067095&group_id=73833&atid=539102.  
It has a patch in it to address the problem.  Would you mind trying it 
on your end before I commit?  If building is a pain, I built you a JAR 
here:http://crawler.archive.org/downloads/tree/heritrix-1.1.0-1067095.jar 
.  REMOVE the old jar and then drop this new jar into your unbundled 
heritrix install.  Let me know if it works for you (Be sure to remove 
the old jar).

See the issue for details (We were faliing to release aborted connections).

Thanks Tom,
St.Ack



Tom Emerson wrote:
